    程序包 说明
    prezoom.controller

    • prezoom.controller中CameraInfoI的使用

      声明为CameraInfoI的prezoom.controller中的字段 
      修饰符和类型 字段 说明
      static CameraInfoI CameraManager.cur_CamInfo
      the info for the current state
      static CameraInfoI CameraManager.presentationCamera
      the camera location used to navigate in the present canvas during presentation, but not affect the stored state camera
      类型参数类型为CameraInfoI的prezoom.controller中的字段 
      修饰符和类型 字段 说明
      protected static java.util.ArrayList<CameraInfoI> CameraManager.state_CamInfo_list
      the array that stores info of each state
      (专用程序包) java.util.ArrayList<CameraInfoI> SaveLoadManager.state_CamInfo_list
      camera info for all states
      返回CameraInfoI的prezoom.controller中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static CameraInfoI CameraManager.getCorrectCamera()
      get the current camera info
      private static CameraInfoI CameraManager.getCur_CamInfoFromList()
      get the camera info for the current state
